metadataAttributes.Title: Foundations of Health Equity Research
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Introduces students to the core principles of health equity research. Covers topics such as defining health equity, engaging community and policy stakeholders, patient-centeredness, cultural competence, and dissemination of research findings. Content will recognize different geographic, cultural, and social contexts where health inequities occur.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Health Research,health equity research,Research Design,Research Methods,Epidemiology,
